data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Agonochaetia Povolný (Lepidoptera, Gelechiidae), and description of a new genus and species from the Canary Islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Landry, Jean-François, Nazari, Vazrick, Bidzilya, Oleksiy, Huemer, Peter, Karsholt, Ole (2017): Review of the genus Agonochaetia Povolný (Lepidoptera, Gelechiidae), and description of a new genus and species from the Canary Islands. Zootaxa 4300 (4): 451-485, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4300.4.1
